verbs.description: [ARGM-LOC: socal] - [V: based] [ARG1: team] invents machine that can make fresh drinking water out of thin air david hertz having learned that under the right conditions you really can make your own water out of thin air put a little contraption on the roof of his office and began cranking out free bottles of h2o for anyone who wanted one water venice drinking water skysourceskywater alliance david hertz skywater skysource skywater alliance california david b hertz skysource thin air
